name: unified-ai-project
description: A unified AI project consolidating MikoAI, Fragmenta, and other CatAI initiatives.

scripts.test: python -c "import platform; print('scripts/setup_env.bat' if platform.system() == 'Windows' else 'bash ./scripts/setup_env.sh')" | xargs -I {} bash -c "{} && pytest"

author: Unified AI Team
